user.title: Region Selection
user.description: Choose the region you want to survey in order to locate Ambient personal weather stations.

station.title: Station Selection
station.description: Select the station you wish to integrate into Home Assistant.

mnemonic.title: Mnemonic Selection
mnemonic.description: Create a distinctive mnemonic for your station, which will be incorporated into all sensor names.

abort.no_stations_found: Did not find any stations in the selected region.
